CustomField.description: -Consider the variable job conditions, cost of materials & labour, manpower, expenses, and also mindful of P&L margin -Source the most cost efficient solution for the client -Ability to calculate the project cost based on the compiled list of task and resources required by client, identify and allocate resources based on our team's capacity, estimate the project duration to create a project schedule and calculate project cost based on the most cost & time efficient method
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Consider the variable job conditions, cost of materials & labour, manpower, expenses, and also mindful of P&L margin -Source the most cost efficient solution for the client -Ability to calculate the project cost based on the compiled list of task and resources required by client, identify and allocate resources based on our team's capacity, estimate the project duration to create a project schedule and calculate project cost based on the most cost & time efficient method
CustomField.label: Quotation Management
